metadata.Title: CVE-2019-12497 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Open Ticket Request System (OTRS) 7.0.x through7.0.8, Community Edition 6.0.x through 6.0.19, and Community Edition 5.0.xthrough 5.0.36. In the customer or external frontend, personal informationof agents (e.g., Name and mail address) can be disclosed in external notes.

criterions.comment: otrs2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
